title: Fix dependency vulnerabilities reported by GitHub
description:
GitHub Dependabot reported 3 vulnerabilities on develop branch:
- 1 critical severity
- 1 moderate severity  
- 1 low severity

See: https://github.com/goatbytes/consoul/security/dependabot

Action items:
1. Review Dependabot alerts
2. Update affected dependencies
3. Test that updates don't break functionality
4. Document any necessary code changes

Priority: High - Critical vulnerability should be addressed promptly

comments.author: jared@goatbytes.io
comments.content:
Found 5 Dependabot alerts:
- CVE-2025-32434 (CRITICAL): PyTorch RCE vulnerability - requires torch >= 2.6.0
- CVE-2025-66471 (HIGH): urllib3 streaming API issue - requires urllib3 >= 2.6.0
- CVE-2025-66418 (HIGH): urllib3 decompression chain issue - requires urllib3 >= 2.6.0
- CVE-2025-3730 (MEDIUM): PyTorch resource shutdown issue - requires torch >= 2.8.0
- CVE-2025-2953 (LOW): PyTorch DoS vulnerability - requires torch >= 2.7.1-rc1

Note: torch is currently pinned to ~2.4.0 due to macOS segfault issues in 2.5+. Will need to update to 2.8.0+ for full fix.

comments.author: jared@goatbytes.io
comments.content:
Updated dependencies to address security vulnerabilities:

✅ urllib3: 2.5.0 → 2.6.0 (fixes CVE-2025-66471 HIGH, CVE-2025-66418 HIGH)
✅ torch: ~2.4.0 → >=2.8.0,<3.0.0 (fixes CVE-2025-32434 CRITICAL, CVE-2025-3730 MEDIUM, CVE-2025-2953 LOW)

Note: torch is an optional dependency (huggingface-local extras only). The torch constraint includes python='<3.14' marker to avoid triton compatibility issues.

Testing:
- poetry lock and install successful
- Basic import verification passed
- Existing linting/type issues are pre-existing and unrelated to dependency updates
